snippet: On a record-breaking night when Kyrie Irving and LeBron James combined for 81 points, it was fitting that the biggest shot belonged to Kyle Korver....

headline.main: DeRozan, Powell Lead Raptors Past Wizards 114-106
headline.print_headline: DeRozan, Powell Lead Raptors Past Wizards 114-106

lead_paragraph: On a record-breaking night when Kyrie Irving and LeBron James combined for 81 points, it was fitting that the biggest shot belonged to Kyle Korver.
